snippet: An Oklahoma lawmaker who once likened Islam to cancer required Muslims to answer several written questions — including, "Do you beat your wife?" — before agreeing to meet with them....

headline.main: Canada: No Plans to Clamp Down at Border to Deter Migrants
headline.print_headline: Canada: No Plans to Clamp Down at Border to Deter Migrants

lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma lawmaker who once likened Islam to cancer required Muslims to answer several written questions — including, "Do you beat your wife?" — before agreeing to meet with them.
